name: Asashin
description:
Asashin is a third-person action stealth vertical slice for Windows, where a trained assassin avenges the death of his master, seeking to defeat the great shinobi leader. Infiltrate an enemy base and choose your approach, by eliminatingyour enemies silently or engaging them in open conflict.

This game was developed by:

Pedro Marques - https://pmarques93.itch.io/
Gabriel Santos - https://jundmaster.itch.io/
Gonçalo Vila Verde - https://mrv3rdinsky.itch.io/

Game DesignersProgammersArtists
Pedro Marques

For a better experience, play this game with a controller.

If you find weird bugs or the game freezes, try disabling your antivirus and run the game again.
